articles.title: 3 takeaways from the Revolution’s 3-2 loss vs. the Chicago Fire
articles.description:
New England's playoff hopes all but ended on a disappointing night in Chicago.

The post 3 takeaways from the Revolution’s 3-2 loss vs. the Chicago Fire appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New England Revolution lost 3-2 to Chicago Fire on September 7, 2025.
This defeat significantly diminishes the team's playoff chances for the season.
Local fans express disappointment as hopes for a successful season fade.

articles.title: Boston’s preliminary election is almost here. Here’s who will be on the ballot
articles.description:
A wide field of mayoral and City Council candidates will be narrowed down through the preliminary election on Sept. 9.

The post Boston’s preliminary election is almost here. Here’s who will be on the ballot appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston's preliminary election will take place on September 9, 2025.
Numerous mayoral and City Council candidates will compete for voter support.
Election results will significantly shape Boston's political landscape and future policies.

articles.title: Maren Morris brings her divorce album to Leader Bank Pavilion
articles.description:
It sent the message that Morris was prepared to share exactly where she is now and wasn't much interested in looking back.

The post Maren Morris brings her divorce album to Leader Bank Pavilion appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Maren Morris performed her divorce album at Leader Bank Pavilion on September 7, 2025.
The concert highlighted Morris's emotional journey, resonating with local fans experiencing similar struggles.
Boston residents engaged with the performance, fostering community connection through shared experiences of heartbreak.
